results.definition: exchange or replace with another, usually of the same kind or category
exchange positions without a change in value
examples: These operators commute with each other

results.definition: exchange a penalty for a less severe one
change the order or arrangement of
a regular journey of some distance to and from your place of work
examples: there is standing room only on the high-speed commute

results.definition: travel back and forth regularly, as between one's place of work and home
